meanings.definition: The art or technique of decorating fabric by applying wax and dye.
meanings.sent1: Batiking involves applying wax and dye to decorate fabric.
meanings.sent2: She learned batiking in art class and made a beautiful fabric design.
meanings.sent3: The batiking process can be messy but results in stunning patterns.
meanings.sent4: Her batiking skills transformed plain fabric into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors and intricate patterns of batiking make it a unique art form.

meanings.definition: The process of creating designs on fabric using wax and dye.
meanings.sent1: Using wax and dye, batiking creates beautiful designs on fabric.
meanings.sent2: The intricate patterns of batiking add a special touch to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled wax while batiking, creating a unique design.
meanings.sent4: The art of batiking turns plain fabric into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The traditional technique of batiking has been passed down for generations.

meanings.definition: To decorate fabric using the batik technique.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys batiking fabric to create unique designs.
meanings.sent2: They spent the weekend batiking fabric for a school project.
meanings.sent3: He tried batiking for the first time and ended up with colorful hands.
meanings.sent4: Batiking allows you to express your creativity on fabric.
meanings.sent5: The artist was busy batiking a new piece for an upcoming exhibition.
